title: "EDRi, Statewatch call for ban of EU-wide police facial recognition system"
excerpt: "The paper says the proposed regulation for automated data exchange for police cooperation fails to provide crucial safeguards to protect individuals’ privacy and biometric data. The existing Prüm framework was created in 2008 to offer a number of laws regulating the automated sharing of personal data between the member states to investigate specific crimes."
